project.project_summary: [1.21.11-pre4 / 1.21.11] - Modpack that mainly tries to support snapshots with maximum performance, including Sodium. This includes minimal QoL mods.

version.changelog:
- Updated [Fabric API](https://modrinth.com/mod/fabric-api) and [Concurrent Chunk Management Engine](https://modrinth.com/mod/c2me-fabric)

- Temporarily (hopefully) removed [Sodium](https://modrinth.com/mod/sodium) and [kennytvs-epic-force-close-loading-screen-mod-for-fabric](https://modrinth.com/mod/forcecloseworldloadingscreen)
